# AI Development Team Framework - Copilot Instructions

This document provides guidance for AI coding agents working on this project.

## Big Picture

The goal of this project is to create a framework for an AI development team. This involves defining the roles and responsibilities of different AI agents, as well as the communication and collaboration protocols between them.

## Project Structure

- `.claude/`: Configuration for the Claude agent.
- `.gemini/`: Configuration for the Gemini agent.
- `.codex/`: Configuration for the Codex agent.
- `AGENTS.md`: Defines the roles and responsibilities of each AI agent.
- `CLAUDE.md`: Specific instructions for the Claude agent.

## Developer Workflow

As the project is in its early stages, the developer workflow is not yet defined. Please check back later for updates.

## Conventions and Patterns

As the project is in its early stages, there are no established conventions or patterns yet. Please check back later for updates.
